EmailTemplate.description: CSR follow up response to customer providing PDR# with RFQ# as reference
EmailTemplate.name: D&S Quotes 2nd Response
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are working on your quote request {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c} .
A P&DR (Price and Delivery Request) # {!Case.Quote_Number__c} has been created in our System. This will be your quotation number and quote will be sent as soon it gets priced.
If you wish to know your quote status, please contact your Customer Support Representative or reply to this email referencing the P&DR number provided.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
